attributes.action: No taxpayers money should be spent on the funeral of Margaret Thatcher
attributes.additional_details:
Baroness Thatcher's funeral should not be funded by the taxpayer, especially at a time when austerity measures are causing the cutting of critical services.
In her own words "There are individual men and women and there are families, and no government can do anything except through people and people look to themselves first….It is our duty to look after ourselves….”
We send our condolences to all who have been affect by the life and death of Baroness Margaret Thatcher.
